title: kaNDAlum kali
sahitya:
kaNDAlum kali tIrumE kaNNA unnaik-kalandAlE sukham AghumE


anupallavi

  uNDAlE nallamudam uLLE pashi tIrum uruvukkuL aruvAna oruvA ennuyiruLLE


caraNam    periya varangaLukku pIDikai pODavillai pittulagOr mecca shaddam pODavillai
karuNAlayA unadu caraNAravindattil kAdalellAm vaittE kAttirukkinrEn ayyA
